description:
Come along to celebrate another great year of CodeHub and share a drink with friends new and old without all those computer screens getting in the way.

Everyone is invited, especially newcomers and those wanting to celebrate Christmas as only a bunch of web & code enthusiasts can!

Great food & drink? Check.
Awesome and interesting party chatter? Check.

Christmas jumpers welcome and encouraged.

See you there!

Following on from mentorship event - see https://www.meetup.com/CodeHub-Bristol/events/256071944/
title: Christmas Social
